name: Wolfenstein Maze 3D
description:
Captured by enemy forces, it's up to you to escape from Castle Wolfenstein and inform allied forces of the dark secrets and plans of enemy forces. Escape your cell and find your way to the exit, collecting weapons, ammo and treasure on the way. Defeat the mutant general to escape and to reveal your discoveries.

Available for GameBoy, Sega Master System, Sega Game Gear and Sega SG-1000
